attributes.action: Help us to stop animal testing!
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to reduce the experiments and to help us make a difference and to get it discussed in parliament. We want to stop the deaths of the animal that dies every eight seconds.
attributes.background: Animal testing is used worldwide everyday to test well known products such as Vaseline and even some chocolate bars including mars bars. Animal testing occurs when companies wish to produce new items. They test on animals to ensure their new product will be safe for human consumption and use.
